column4: i'm trying to figure out how tbh, i can only ssh in via one account, so i'm trying to figure out how to launch in this one account but run as another
years ago i played in a ubuntu server box and had figured out there was a way to like, at a low level specify 'everything that goes in this folder is always xx group xx owner with ### permissions'
documentation-wise, you can read « man setfacl », « man getfacl », and « man mount » (you need to mount the partition with the "acl" option, so update your fstab)
